HomePage.description: The Dyson India homepage presents product categories, promotions, and a subscription popup.

elements.name: Email Address Input
elements.description: Input field for entering the email address to subscribe.

elements.name: Claim Offer Button
elements.description: Button to submit the email address and claim the offer.

elements.name: Close Subscription Popup
elements.description: Button to close the subscription popup.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field

assertions: The 'Email Address' input field is present

DysonIndiaOfficialWebsitePage.description: This page displays Dyson's deals and promotions, showcasing products like the 'hushjet' purifier.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input box to find products and parts.

elements.name: Shop Now
elements.description: Button to navigate to the product page.

elements.name: Deals Link
elements.description: Link to the deals page.

elements.name: Vacuum & wet cleaners Link
elements.description: Link to the vacuum cleaners page.

elements.name: Hair care Link
elements.description: Link to the hair care products page.

elements.name: Air purifier Link
elements.description: Link to the air purifier products page.

elements.name: Headphones Link
elements.description: Link to the headphones products page.

elements.name: Lighting Link
elements.description: Link to the lighting products page.

elements.name: Support Link
elements.description: Link to the support page.

elements.name: Best sellers Link
elements.description: Link to the best sellers page.

assertions: Page title contains 'Deals and offers | Dyson India'
Header text 'Compact. Powerful. Yet quiet.' is visible
Element with text 'Dyson.in exclusive: 24 months no cost EMI' is visible

DysonDealsPage.description: This page displays deals and promotions offered by Dyson India. It allows users to browse and explore various product categories and specific deals.

elements.name: Deals Link
elements.description: Link to the deals page.

elements.name: Vacuum & wet cleaners Link
elements.description: Link to the vacuum and wet cleaners page.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input box to find products and parts.

elements.name: Cord-free Vacuums Link
elements.description: Link to Cord-free Vacuums page.

elements.name: Corded Vacuums Link
elements.description: Link to Corded Vacuums page.

elements.name: Wet & Dry vacuum cleaners Link
elements.description: Link to Wet & Dry vacuum cleaners page.

elements.name: Wet floor cleaners Link
elements.description: Link to Wet floor cleaners page.

elements.name: Shop all vacuum cleaners Link
elements.description: Link to Shop all vacuum cleaners page.

elements.name: Help me choose Link
elements.description: Link to Help me choose page.

elements.name: Stands, tools, batteries & filters Link
elements.description: Link to Stands, tools, batteries & filters page.

elements.name: Dyson Dust Research Link
elements.description: Link to Dyson Dust Research page.

elements.name: Pet Science Link
elements.description: Link to Pet Science page.

elements.name: Close Exclusive Offer
elements.description: Button to close the exclusive offer popup.

assertions: Page contains the text 'Dyson.in exclusive: 24 months no cost EMI'

DysonHairCarePage.description: This page is the Dyson Hair Care landing page on the Dyson India website. It showcases Dyson's hair care products and provides links to explore different product categories.

elements.name: Hair Care Tab
elements.description: Link to the main Hair Care page.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field to find specific products or parts.

elements.name: Shopping Cart Icon
elements.description: Link to the shopping cart.

elements.name: Hair Stylers
elements.description: Link to the Hair Stylers product category.

elements.name: Hair Dryers
elements.description: Link to the Hair Dryers product category.

elements.name: Hair Straighteners
elements.description: Link to the Hair Straighteners product category.

elements.name: Professional Hair Care
elements.description: Link to the Professional Hair Care product category.

elements.name: Shop All Hair Care
elements.description: Link to view all hair care products.

elements.name: Gifts
elements.description: Link to the Gifts product category.

elements.name: Cases, Accessories & Attachments
elements.description: Link to the Cases, Accessories & Attachments product category.

elements.name: Styling Guides
elements.description: Link to the Styling Guides product category.

elements.name: Hair Science
elements.description: Link to the Hair Science product category.

elements.name: Close Promotion
elements.description: Button to close the promotion banner.

assertions: The 'Hair care' tab is highlighted in the navigation bar.
The 'Search products and parts' search box is visible.
At least one hair care product category link is visible (e.g., 'Hair stylers').

DysonAirTreatmentPage.description: This page is the Dyson Air Treatment landing page, showcasing air purifiers and related information.

elements.name: Air Purifier Link
elements.description: Link to the Air Purifier product category page.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field to search for products and parts.

elements.name: Air Purifiers
elements.description: Link to the Air Purifiers product listing page.

elements.name: Purifier + Heaters
elements.description: Link to the Purifier + Heaters product listing page.

elements.name: Shop all air purifiers
elements.description: Link to shop all air purifiers.

elements.name: Help me choose
elements.description: Link to help me choose a purifier.

elements.name: Purifier filters
elements.description: Link to purifier filters.

elements.name: Exclusive Offer Close Button
elements.description: Button to close the exclusive offer banner.

assertions: The 'Search products and parts' search box is visible
The 'Exclusive: 10X reward points' banner is visible

DysonHeadphonesPage.description: This page is the Dyson Headphones landing page, showcasing and promoting their 'OnTrac' headphones.

elements.name: Headphones Link
elements.description: Link to the main Headphones category page.

elements.name: OnTrac Headphones Link
elements.description: Link to the OnTrac headphones product page.

elements.name: Shop Now Button
elements.description: Button to navigate to the product details page for the featured headphones.

elements.name: Ear cushions & caps Link
elements.description: Link to the Ear cushions & caps product page.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field to search for products and parts.

elements.name: Close Promotion
elements.description: Button to close the promotion banner.

assertions: Header text 'ontrac Headphones, remastered' is present

DysonLightingPage.description: This page is dedicated to showcasing Dyson's lighting products and providing information about their features and benefits.

elements.name: Lighting Navigation Link
elements.description: Link to the main Dyson Lighting page.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field to find specific products or parts.

elements.name: Dyson Solarcycle Morph™ Link
elements.description: Link to the Dyson Solarcycle Morph product page.

elements.name: Shop lighting Link
elements.description: Link to the Dyson Shop lighting product page.

elements.name: Exclusive Offer Close Button
elements.description: Button to close the exclusive offer banner.

assertions: The 'Dyson Solarcycle Morph™' link is visible

UnknownPage.description: This is the Dyson Support page, which provides resources for troubleshooting, finding spare parts, and accessing user guides.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field for products and parts.

elements.name: Solve a problem
elements.description: Link to the troubleshooting tool.

elements.name: Find the right part
elements.description: Link to find spare parts.

elements.name: Tips, user guides and software updates
elements.description: Link to user guides and software updates.

assertions: Text 'Solve a problem, find spare parts and read expert tips and guides.' is visible
Text 'How can we help?' is visible
